definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The return of the Milu deer is a good example of friendship and cooperation between China and Britain.
sentences.chinese: 麋鹿迴歸是中英兩國友誼和合作的一個很好的例子。

sentences.english: The state of our inner-city schools is a case in point.
sentences.chinese: 我們內城區學校的狀況就是一個恰當的例子。

sentences.english: Another example is the blood donation campaign.
sentences.chinese: 另一個例子是捐血戰役。

sentences.english: Let's look at this 8th variance of this, otherwise, simple example.
sentences.chinese: 這是這個例子的第8個變量版本，很簡單。

sentences.english: But this is perhaps a very simple example of ASCII art.
sentences.chinese: 這是字符藝術方面一個非常簡單的例子。

sentences.english: In other words, this is an example of good and bad prejudice, right?
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，這個例子裏有好先見和壞先見，是吧？

sentences.english: In fact, Yang Chengxing's case is by no means a rare one.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，毫無疑問，楊誠星的例子是很罕見的。

sentences.english: In this example we maintain only one copy of the data.
sentences.chinese: 在這個例子中，我們僅維護數據的一個副本。

sentences.english: Expressing opinions is one example of culture difference between east and west.
sentences.chinese: 表達觀點的不同是中西文化差異的一個典型例子。

sentences.english: The example also checks the validity of you imput.
sentences.chinese: 這個例子也能檢查的有效性，你輸入。

sentences.english: You should include some examples in the text.
sentences.chinese: 你應該在文章中舉一些例子。

sentences.english: In the example, add the genre of a movie as its own field.
sentences.chinese: 在這個例子中，添加了電影風格作爲內容類型的字段。

sentences.english: The George Takei crossover was a priceless one.
sentences.chinese: 竹井喬治的穿越表演就是一個無價的例子。

sentences.english: The business world is full of examples of hubris taking over.
sentences.chinese: 企業界到處都是自大狂掌管一切的例子。

sentences.english: A good example of something similar is ticketmaster, yet it does not need to be so complicated.
sentences.chinese: 一個很好的例子是類似特瑪，但它並不需要這麼複雜。

sentences.english: A compilable example would be best.
sentences.chinese: 一個編譯例子是最好的。

definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
